name: dsp-ts-redis
description: High-performance DSP library with native C++ acceleration and Redis state persistence

scripts.build: node-gyp rebuild && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.cpSync('build/Release/dsp-ts-redis.node', 'src/build/dsp-ts-redis.node', {force: true}); console.log('Copied build/Release/dsp-ts-redis.node to src/build/dsp-ts-redis.node');"
